citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:28-12:58pm on
1/27/2021. The inspector honked their horn, called the number on file, left a voice mail and waited in the driveway for 30
minutes prior to departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:28-12:58pm on 
1/27/2021. The inspector honked their horn, called the number on file, left a voice mail and waited in the driveway for 30 
minutes prior to departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
